name: Bubble Shooter Blast!
description:
Classic bubble shooter game that you can't put down when pick up!

Shoot bubbles and pop, easy and enjoyble! Lots of fun levels waiting!

Features:
- Finely-tuned shoot and pop feeling.
- Great graphics and animations.
- Lots of fun special bubbles in high level.
- Get powerful power-ups to help you pass the tricky levels.
- Hundreds of challenging levels.
- Easy-to-play, hard-to-master.
- Free download and more free levels to come in the future.

In Bubble Shooter Blast!, your goal in each level is to pop all the bubbles with limited shoot bubbles.

The game will gets more and more engaging while your playing, be patient and shoot carefully to win!

To get 3 stars, try to use less shoot bubbles to win!

Bubble Shooter Blast! is super easy to play and it will be hard for you to put it down.
